description.main: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Gran Versalles! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.</br>Gran Hotel Versalles is in a quiet area of central Madrid, next to Alonso Martínez Metro Station. It is a classic-style hotel offering a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.</br>The Versalles is just a 5-minute walk from the vibrant Chueca district. Alonso Martínez is a major metro station and from here you can reach the Art Triangle in around 15 minutes.</br>The air-conditioned rooms at the Versalles Gran Hotel feature carpeted floors. They come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.</br>The hotel’s Café Luxemburgo offers tapas and drinks throughout the day. There are various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.</br>This is our guests' favorite part of Madrid, according to independent reviews.</br>Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.3 for a two-person trip.

description.main: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Ilunion Alcalá Norte! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.</br>The stylish Ilunion Alcalá Norte is located in the Madrid, in the north area, within a 10-minute drive of the IFEMA Conference Center and Madrid-Barajas Airport. It offers spacious rooms with free WiFi.</br>The Ilunion Alcalá Norte’s air-conditioned rooms come with a 43'' flat-screen TV with satellite channels, work desk, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.</br>This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.</br>The Alcalá’s restaurant offers a daily breakfast, as well as à la carte and daily menus. During the summer months, guests can enjoy their meals on the outdoor terrace. Room service is available during limited hours. There is also a special menu for celiacs and food intolerant guests.</br>One pet is allowed under availability with the hotel. Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of this room type. Once at the property, guests will receive the rules of access, which must be read and approved.</br>The number 28 bus stops 100 m away from the property, providing easy access to Madrid city center. The Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 1.9 mi from Ilunion Alcalá Norte.</br>This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.</br>Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.1 for a two-person trip.

Facing the beachfront, Peponi Hotel Lamu - Kenya offers 4-star accommodations in Shela and features an outdoor swimming pool, garden and terrace. The property provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.</br>At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at Peponi Hotel Lamu - Kenya also provide guests with a sea view. description.title: Stay in the heart of Sharm El Sheikh
description.main: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Stella Di Mare Beach Hotel & Spa! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.</br>This luxurious 5-star resort is located on a private beach at scenic Na'ama Bay’s entrance. The resort offers 3 gourmet restaurants, state-of-the-art dove training and a 600 m2 spa.</br>Stella Di Mare’s modern, spacious rooms have large windows and plenty of natural light. Each features a private outdoor terrace or balcony, some with sweeping views of the Red Sea. In-room amenities include satellite LCD TV and all-day room service.</br>Stella Di Mare’s lagoon-style outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by a waterfall and tropical gardens. Guests can snorkel in coral reefs located directly off of the resort’s beach. Evening entertainment is offered nightly.</br>La Terrazza serves candlelit dinners at its outdoor, sea-facing terrace. Fresh Mediterranean cuisine is available at Stella Di Mare’s Corallo Rosso restaurant. Italian cuisine is on offer at La Scogliera.</br>The islands of Ras Mohammed National Park are 9.9 mi from the hotel. Stella Di Mare Beach Hotel & Spa is located a 20-minute drive away from Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport. A free shuttle service to Naama Bay is offered.</br>This is our guests' favorite part of Sharm El Sheikh, according to independent reviews.</br>Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.
